Title: [TP.HCM] Senior Route To Market Specialist
Company: Carlsberg Vietnam
Location: Sonatus Buiding, 15 Lê Thánh Tôn, Phường Sài Gòn, TP.HCM, 15th floor, Sonatus Building, 15 Le Thanh Ton, Ben Nghe, District 1, HCMC
Job Description:
A. Main purpose of the position
This position is to: The Senior Route-to-Market (RTM) Specialist is responsible for developing and optimizing Carlsberg Việt Nam’s RTM model, ensuring seamless product distribution, efficient sales force execution, and strategic distributor management. The role involves spearheading RTM strategies, enhancing cost models, improving sales force effectiveness, and deploying advanced digital solutions for RTM operations.

B. Job responsibilities
1. Strategies & Development
Spearhead the integration and enhancement of the RTM Model, incorporating agile strategies and conducting annual reviews to refine regional RTM frameworks.
Develop and implement the RTM Cost Model to monitor and improve operational effectiveness and efficiency.
Lead alignment and collaboration with channel partners to integrate the RTM model and drive seamless execution across all channels.
Formulate regional distribution coverage plans, segmented by SKU, brand, and geography, ensuring optimal market reach.
Design and execute stage-wise RTM transformation plans to support the company’s growth phases.
Design and develop route-plan by SRs level.

2. Sales Force Effectiveness & Efficiency
Elevate field force performance by designing tools, launching initiatives, and follow-up KPIs and incentive structures.
Conduct in-depth analysis of territory-level KPIs to uncover key insights and drive strategic decision-making.
Champion continuous business improvements in secondary sales, focusing on optimizing route productivity and enhancing cost efficiencies.

3. Distribution channel management:
Propose strategy to maximize each distribution channels by distribution channel segmentation
Set up criteria of quality outlet
Optimize trade investment by outlet segmentation
Partner with business stakeholders to tailor-made plans by territory and channel

4. Distributor Management
Oversee the development and refinement of distributor models, including goal-setting, KPI proposals, and performance tracking systems.
Lead initiatives to optimize distribution matrices and territory mapping, addressing growth and expansion opportunities with tailored RTM solutions.
Deploy the mass ROI model for all distributors in region incharge, ensuring financial viability and performance tracking.

5. Project Management & Digital Transformation
Other project & adhoc tasks from line manager.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, or a related field.
• 3 - 5 years of experience in Route-to-Market, Commercial Strategy, Sales Operations, or Distributor Management in FMCG
• Strong understanding of RTM frameworks, distributor networks, and sales force execution.
• Strategic Thinking & Problem-Solving – Ability to develop and refine RTM strategies for market expansion.
• Data Analytics & Performance Management – Strong analytical skills to track KPIs, manage costs, and enhance efficiency.
• Stakeholder Management & Negotiation – Strong collaboration with distributors, sales teams, and partners.
• MS Office proficiency PowerBI, Excel & Other tool…
• Fluent English.

Thông tin khác
• Bằng cấp: Đại học
• Thời gian thử việc: 2 tháng (hưởng đầy đủ lương)
• Cơ hội huấn luyện: Được đào tạo nâng cao nghiệp vụ thường xuyên
• Độ tuổi: Không giới hạn tuổi
• Thời gian làm việc: Thứ 2 - Thứ 6
• Đồng nghiệp: Môi trường làm việc năng động, chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện
• Phúc lợi: Thưởng cuối năm - Phụ thuộc vào tình hình kinh doanh của Công ty và kết quả làm việc của nhân viên (trung bình 2-5 tháng lương)
• Ngày nghỉ: 12 ngày nghỉ phép/ năm
• Lương: Cạnh tranh

Title: Senior Performance Marketing Specialist (Up-To $7000) - HCM
Company: Crossian Việt Nam
Location: Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, Tầng 1, Toà nhà Pax Sky, 63 - 65 phố Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Tầng 5, Pax Sky, 63-65 Ngô Thì Nhậm, Phường Phạm Đình Hổ, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, TP Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in the last 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer lifetime value.
As our Performance Marketing Specialist, you'll be in charge of developing and executing performance-driven advertising campaigns. Your expertise will be instrumental in optimizing campaigns, maximizing return on ad spend, and driving customer acquisition and retention. We're seeking someone with a strong background in performance marketing and a proven track record of achieving significant growth and driving results.
WHAT WILL YOU DO
• Develop and execute performance marketing strategies on platform to acquire customers and boost customer lifetime value.
• Plan, set up, and optimize Facebook advertising campaigns effectively.
• Dive deep into campaign data to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), track campaign success, and make data-driven decisions for optimization.
• Collaborate closely with our creative, analytics, and product teams to ensure seamless campaign execution and cohesive messaging.

Title: Sales Planning Executive
Company: Daikin Air Conditioning (Vietnam) Joint Stock Company
Location: 201-203 Cách Mạng Tháng Tám, phường 4, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 201-203 Cach Mang Thang 8, Ward 4, Dist 3, HCM city
Job Description:
This position is part of the Sales planning team that is responsible for the creation and continual monitoring of sales progress vs budgets. Besides, Sales planning team is responsible for creating specific strategies and schemes to expand the business in Vietnam over the long-term. This position prepares and analyzes periodical and ad-hoc reports on budget and sales progress, in addition to supporting the Sales planning team in the creation of various planning modules on the company planning system

1. Participate in developing sales scheme, budget and building pricelist for each sales channels and SBU accordingly
2. Assist the consolidation of sales forecast and target commitment as well as follow sales progress by department and SBU wise for timely and precise report to top management
3. Collect, understand and interpret data relating to periodical sales progress to update on sales progress and provide observation for top management and management meetings
4. Support in creating sales program following company sales strategy and related department procedure
5. Frequently update analyses relating to not only total company sales objectives and progresses but also market information and competitor movement by comprehensively market reports and cooperating with other departments
6. Continually review and improve current work procedures and reports.
Job Requirements:
• Over 3 years' experience in sales planning, or related department.
• Job holder is required to have strategic thinking, good attention to detail, analytical skills, communication and self-presentation skills
• A good understanding of business or sales planning and strategy through study or previous working experience is preferred
• Self-study and willing-to-learn attitude
• Proficiency in Excel is a must. Comfortable to work with multi-level analysis and presentations.
• A team player and self-motivated individual at the same time
• Proficiency in spoken and written English
Keyword: Daikin Air Conditioning (Vietnam) Joint Stock Company

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Digital channel development
• Identify, evaluate, and initiate partnerships with relevant e-commerce platforms, marketplaces (e.g., Shopee, Lazada, Tiki), social commerce platforms (e.g., TikTok Shop, Facebook Shop), affiliate networks, livestreaming platforms, and B2B platforms (e.g., LinkedIn).
